#define lli long long int
using namespace std;
#define gc getchar_unlocked

#define mod 10000007


int power(int i,int p)
{
    if(p==0)
        return 1;
    if(p==1)
        return i;
    int64_t t=power(i,p/2);
     t=(t*t)%mod;
     return (t*power(i,p%2))%mod;
}

int main()
{
  int t;
  cin>>t;
  while(t--)
  {  int n;
     cin>>n;
     int p=power(2,n);
     if(n%2==0)
        cout<<(p+1)%mod<<"\n";
     else
        cout<<(p-1)%mod<<"\n";
  }
}
